subject: Re: Suites in Junit4?
msgSnippet: ... i m providing u sample format to solve ur purpose ======================================== test classes ======================================== class
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "otterblob" <otterblob@...> wrote:
>
> Hello otterblob,
i m providing u sample format to solve ur purpose
========================================
test classes
========================================
class SampleTestA
{
@Test
public void method1()
{
}

@Test
public void method2()
{
}
}

class SampleTestB
{
@Test
public void method1()
{
}

@Test
public void method2()
{
}
}

========================================
Suite class
========================================

@RunWith(Suite.class)
@SuiteClasses({SampleTestA.class,SampleTestB.class})
public class SampleSuite
{
public static Test suite ()
{
return new JUnit4TestAdapter(SampleSuite.class);
}
}
